item.title: Are You Working on Your Mindset as Much as Your Python?
item.description: In this post we share our favourite lessons from basketball coach Wooden: enjoy the game (more than the result), many small improvements compound over time, your actions reveal your character, stay humble, and keep emotion and ego in check.
item.dc:creator: Bob

item.title: There is NO Competition, Stop Comparing Yourself to Others
item.description: The sure way to feel less fulfilled and increase imposter syndrome? Comparing yourself to others ...
item.dc:creator: Bob
